page.title: 04THE HERTS AGRICULTURAL SHOW
page.content: {The Herts Show}is a big agricultural event that happens every year in the Whitsuntide weekend.It is held at{Friars Wash}a large open field just north of the village.It is a two day event and this year over{26,000 } people came over the two days.To get in it costs Â£3.50 for adults and Â£1.50 for children and old age pensioners. {REDBOURN}is part of an agricultural community,with 15 farms around it.This is why it is probably held here. Mr.Mark Dicken,secretary of the {Hertfordshire Agricultural Society,} who organizes it says,"We are trying to bring farming to the public in the best possible light."This was done by putting the animals in Marquees where the public could get a good look at them. Also for the farmers they have competitions for all sorts of animals.
